name: Farm machinery
description: Farm Machinery subject is a very good subject. The students who graduate from Farm Machinery  usually work as technicians and mechanical engineers in some big institutes.

name: Electrical
description: Electrical subject is a good subject. If you study this electrical, you can get a good paying job in any company or government rural power station, either publicly or privately.

name: Electronics
description: Electronics subject is a very good subject. If one can study electronics well, then in future he will be able to make and repair various kinds of small and big electronics products and even if he does not get a job, he can save a lot of money with shop.

name: Computar
description: People are studying computer engineering more nowadays because it is important to learn computer to keep pace with the digital age. If you can learn computer coding, you can do a lot in life.
